channel.title: How to fix ::npc
channel.description: Whenever I do ::npc 276 or anything nothing pops up! not even me doing ::npc l witch would show the syantix. Please help :confused:

item.title: How to fix ::npc
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“lolvengeance, post:2, topic:218070”] } else if (command.startsWith(“npc”)) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

                if (newNPC >= 0) {
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0),
                            heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10,
                            absY + -10, 1,
                            server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                    sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such NPC.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
            }[/quote]

I’m sorry, don’t be stupid(it’s not your fault). The first bracket is bad.
[hr]

Make wherever you add that, that the previous command is missing a bracket, or delete one bracket than add one to the end of the command.

Read full topic

item.title: How to fix ::npc
item.dc:creator: @lolvengeance lolvengeance
item.description:
@lolvengeance wrote:

        } else if (command.startsWith("npc")) {
            try {
                int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4));

                if (newNPC >= 0) {
                    server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0),
                            heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10,
                            absY + -10, 1,
                            server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false);
                    sendMessage("You spawn an npc");
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such NPC.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1");
            }

Read full topic
